an10.95:4.1: Atha kho uttiyo paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.95:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an10.95:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho uttiyo paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.95:4.5: “kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti?
an10.95:5.1: “Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti?
an10.95:6.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, antavā loko … pe …
an10.95:6.7: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā …
an10.95:6.8: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti?
an10.95:6.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti.
an10.95:7.1: “‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno ‘abyākataṃ kho etaṃ, uttiya, mayā—
an10.95:7.2: sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
an10.95:8.1: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an10.95:8.2: ‘etampi kho, uttiya, abyākataṃ mayā asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
an10.95:9.1: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, antavā loko … pe …
an10.95:9.7: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā …
an10.95:9.8: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an10.95:9.10: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
an10.95:10.1: “Abhiññāya kho ahaṃ, uttiya, sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ desemi sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
an10.95:11.1: “Yaṃ panetaṃ bhavaṃ gotamo abhiññāya sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ desesi sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, sabbo vā tena loko nīyati upaḍḍho vā tibhāgo vā”ti?
an10.95:12.2: “mā hevaṃ kho uttiyo paribbājako pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭilabhi:
an10.95:12.3: ‘sabbasāmukkaṃsikaṃ vata me samaṇo gotamo pañhaṃ puṭṭho saṃsādeti, no vissajjeti, na nūna visahatī’ti.
an10.95:12.4: Tadassa uttiyassa paribbājakassa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyā”ti.
an10.95:13.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando uttiyaṃ paribbājakaṃ etadavoca:
an10.95:13.3: Upamāya midhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānanti.
an10.95:13.4: Seyyathāpi, āvuso uttiya, rañño paccantimaṃ nagaraṃ daḷhuddhāpaṃ daḷhapākāratoraṇaṃ ekadvāraṃ.
an10.95:13.5: Tatrassa dovāriko paṇḍito byatto medhāvī aññātānaṃ nivāretā ñātānaṃ pavesetā.
an10.95:13.6: So tassa nagarassa samantā anupariyāyapathaṃ anukkamati.
an10.95:13.7: Anupariyāyapathaṃ anukkamamāno na passeyya pākārasandhiṃ vā pākāravivaraṃ vā, antamaso biḷāranikkhamanamattampi.
an10.95:13.8: No ca khvassa evaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti:
an10.95:13.9: ‘ettakā pāṇā imaṃ nagaraṃ pavisanti vā nikkhamanti vā’ti.
an10.95:13.11: ‘ye kho keci oḷārikā pāṇā imaṃ nagaraṃ pavisanti vā nikkhamanti vā, sabbe te iminā dvārena pavisanti vā nikkhamanti vā’ti.
an10.95:14.1: Evamevaṃ kho, āvuso uttiya, na tathāgatassa evaṃ ussukkaṃ hoti:
an10.95:14.2: ‘sabbo vā tena loko nīyati, upaḍḍho vā, tibhāgo vā’ti.
an10.95:14.4: ‘ye kho keci lokamhā nīyiṃsu vā nīyanti vā nīyissanti vā, sabbe te pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe, catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā, satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvā.
an10.95:14.5: Evamete lokamhā nīyiṃsu vā nīyanti vā nīyissanti vā’ti.
an10.95:14.6: Yadeva kho tvaṃ, āvuso uttiya, bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi tadevetaṃ pañhaṃ bhagavantaṃ aññena pariyāyena apucchi.
an10.95:14.7: Tasmā te taṃ bhagavā na byākāsī”ti.
